#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int cof(int x)
{
	int count=0;
	while(x!=0)
	{
		if(x%2!=0)
			count+=1;
		x=x/2;
	}
	return count;

}
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t;
	int n;
	int flag;
	cin>>t;
	while(t)
	{
		cin>>n;
		flag=0;
		while(n)
		{
			flag+=cof(n);
			n--;
		}
		cout<<flag<<endl;
		t--;
	}
	return 0;
}
